Articles.Content:
wanted to say hello to Squad and the rest of the community and extend my gratitude for such an amazing gaming experience. i must admit, when i first started playing in 1.0.4. i was quite upset with the little things that didnt work... i hope i didnt make a complete ass of myself with the brash comments... (which i edited... cuz im just a grouch sometimes... well most of the time...working on it, bear with me plz...) but i have come to realize and see all the things that do work in the game, and all the updates and hard work that the team is doing to make this "game" sustainable and fun! again, thank you, and look forward and upward to seeing more!

heres to looking up !! my latest thing.

Hello tech2000 and welcome!

You are not the only grouch (who's working on it) around here so no worries.  We do try pretty hard to maintain a level of respect around here, though.

The SQUAD devs are indeed working hard to improve and enhance the game.

Happy landings!

i am really amazed at the work being done to the game. when youre a noob, its easy to see things that dont work, and hard to appreciate all the work that was done to get it to where it is now... i suppose for me, my appreciation for the game, made me take a look back at was was done, and again, im like wow... they did a lot !!! thanks starhawk!
and i just spent the last hour reading your Missions of a Rescue thread... and im only like a quarter way through... you sir, are awesome! nicely done craft and missions!!!
